skills.title: Front-End

skills.title: Back-End

skills.title: Database

portfolio.title: Fingertip
portfolio.description: Fingertip is a fintech project designed for corporate companies to facilitate financial transactions on web platform, maintain accountability, and track transaction history. Companies can input their own details, including bank, KYC and card information, as well as customer and vendor data. The platform enables payments to both customers and vendors, along with other utility payment.

portfolio.title: Traceability
portfolio.description: Our web application simplifies ledger management and enhances traceability for chain manufacturing companies. It includes features such as dynamic dashboard, comprehensive reports, user management, bulk data upload and tracking history functionalities.

portfolio.title: NBytes
portfolio.description: Netbulk is a web application designed to streamline the management of user's ship and port details. Users can effortlessly add and manage voyage details for both time and voyage charters, enhancing operational efficiency. Additionally, the portal empowers users to maintain their stock holdings ,monitor future values and Mark-to-Market (MTM) details with ease. With its intuitive interface and robust features, Netbulk serves as a valuable tool for maritime professionals seeking efficient vessel and cargo management.

portfolio.title: PDF to HTML
portfolio.description: PDF to HTML Conversion involved converting PDF book pages into HTML pages, primarily for students' learning purposes.

education.place: Dr.SNS Rajalakshmi College of Arts and Science, Coimbatore
